subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Deaths (Obituaries)
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rathmann once held the record for fastest winning speed and parlayed his driving success into a Chevrolet-Cadillac dealership that leased cars to astronauts at virtually no cost.
snippet: Mr. Rathmann once held the record for fastest winning speed and parlayed his driving success into a Chevrolet-Cadillac dealership that leased cars to astronauts at virtually no cost.
